text: The Socialist Party of the Balearic Islands–PSOE (') is the regional branch in the Balearic Islands of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE), the main centre-left party in Spain since the 1970s. ==Secretary-Generals== {| class=wikitable ! | ! President !
